description:
When linking entities in forms, provide rich auto-complete with entity previews (key details, status, recent activity) to ensure users select the correct record from similar options.

**Rationale:** Many entities have similar names (multiple John Smiths, similarly-named events). Selecting the wrong entity creates incorrect associations that are hard to detect and fix later, corrupting relationship integrity.
title: Entity Reference Auto-Complete with Previews
